# polytomic_gorgias_connection (Data Source)

Gorgias Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "polytomic_gorgias_connection" "gorgias" {
  id = "aab123aa-27f3-abc1-9999-abcde123a4aa"
}
```

### Nested Schema for `configuration`
